titles.title: Expressing the sense of the House of Representatives that the President and the Secretary of State should continue to press Russian authorities for a full and complete accounting regarding the fate of Raoul Wallenberg.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Foreign Affairs.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Africa, Global Health, and Human Rights.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Europe and Eurasia.

committee.subcommittee: Africa, Global Health, and Human Rights
committee.name: House Foreign Affairs

term.name: War crimes, genocide, crimes against humanity

bill.summary: 3/29/2012--Introduced. Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the President and the Secretary of State should continue to press Russian authorities for a complete accounting of Raoul Wallenberg's fate.
